content: MQA-S Galvanized pipe clamp saddle for connecting threaded components to strut channels ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick connection of threaded components to the open side of HS strut channels Easy installation and positioning within strut channel openings Robust single-part design for higher productivity and flexibility Channel nut and square washer combined into one, ready-to-use piece Applications Fastening pipes and air ducts Fastening cable trays and cable baskets Recommended for use in dry, interior environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Thread connection - M: 3/8 in Material composition: Connector: DD11 MOD - HN 547, S235JR - DIN EN 10025 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Material composition | Connector: DD11 MOD - HN 547, S235JR - DIN EN 10025 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2293069 - Pipe ring saddle MQA-S-3/8 - Package Size 50 pc
